question: when a woman is on her monthly period, after going toilet, does she have to do istanjah as normal with water?
answer:
QUESTION

assalam alaikum

when a woman is on her monthly period, after going toilet, does she have to do istanjah as normal with water?

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is masnoon to do istinjah with normal water after using the toilet whether one is in the state of menstruation cycle (period)or  not.

(Behashti zewar, Vol 2, Pg8, maktabah tahanwi, deoband)

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student, Darul Iftaa
